类 Savings

java.lang.Object
Account
Savings
直接已知子类:
MoneyMarket
public class Savings extends Account
Savings class extend Account create savings and money market saving combined information calculate interest and fee get type
作者:
Tianle Chen tc822, Zesheng Zhang zz354

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    double
    fee()
    calculate fee if it is saving, balance greater than 300 , fee is 0 if is Money Market Saving, withdraw greater than 3, need fee balance greater than 2500, fee is 0
    int
    getLoyal()
    determine whether account is loyal
    String
    getType()
    get type of account
    double
    monthlyInterest()
    calculate monthly interest determined by whether is loyal and type
    String
    toString()
    combine information determined by type of account then determine whether closed if closed, withdraw change to 0

    • Savings

      public Savings(int loyal)
      create Savings
      参数:

    • Savings

      public Savings(String type, double Annual_Interest_Rate, double Monthly_Fee, int numofWD)
      create MoneyMarketSaving default loyal
      参数:
      type - account type
      Annual_Interest_Rate - interest rate
      Monthly_Fee - fee

    • fee

      public double fee()
      calculate fee if it is saving, balance greater than 300 , fee is 0 if is Money Market Saving, withdraw greater than 3, need fee balance greater than 2500, fee is 0
